name: BloodHound Collection Files
description: Detects default file names outputted by the BloodHound collection tool SharpHound
query: (file.path:(/.*_[Bb][Ll][Oo][Oo][Dd][Hh][Oo][Uu][Nn][Dd]\.[Zz][Ii][Pp]/ OR /.*_[Cc][Oo][Mm][Pp][Uu][Tt][Ee][Rr][Ss]\.[Jj][Ss][Oo][Nn]/ OR /.*_[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Aa][Ii][Nn][Ee][Rr][Ss]\.[Jj][Ss][Oo][Nn]/ OR /.*_[Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn][Ss]\.[Jj][Ss][Oo][Nn]/ OR /.*_[Gg][Pp][Oo][Ss]\.[Jj][Ss][Oo][Nn]/ OR /.*_[Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp][Ss]\.[Jj][Ss][Oo][Nn]/ OR /.*_[Oo][Uu][Ss]\.[Jj][Ss][Oo][Nn]/ OR /.*_[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\.[Jj][Ss][Oo][Nn]/) OR (file.path:/.*[Bb][Ll][Oo][Oo][Dd][Hh][Oo][Uu][Nn][Dd].*/ AND file.path:/.*\.[Zz][Ii][Pp].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:(*_BloodHound.zip OR *_computers.json OR *_containers.json OR *_domains.json OR *_gpos.json OR *_groups.json OR *_ous.json OR *_users.json) OR (file.path:*BloodHound* AND file.path:*.zip*))`
